text: The Onedin Line was a drama TV show about a family who runs a shipping company in the late 19th century. It was on the BBC from 1971 to 1980 for 8 seasons and 91 episodes. It starred Peter Gilmore playing the title character. ==Other websites== * * The Internet Movie Database * There were 91 episodes broadcast from October 1971 to October 1980 see this link for a complete list and more details * Anne Stallybrass & Peter Gilmore, the actors who played Anne and James Onedin * Website of Michael E Briant, who directed some of the episodes Category:1971 television series debuts Category:1980 television series endings Category:1980s British drama television series Category:1970s British drama television series Category:English-language television programs Category:1980s British television series endings
title: The Onedin Line
